name: hubot-icinga2
description: A hubot script that receives and shows icinga2 notification in the chat-room
readme:
# hubot-icinga2

A hubot script that receives and shows icinga2 notification in the chat-room

See [`src/hubot-icinga2.coffee`](src/hubot-icinga2.coffee) for full documentation.

## Installation

In hubot project repo, run:

`npm install hubot-icinga2 --save`

Then add **hubot-icinga2** to your `external-scripts.json`:

```json
[
  "hubot-icinga2"
]
```

## Sample Interaction

```
user1>> hubot hello
hubot>> hello!
```

## NPM Module

https://www.npmjs.com/package/hubot-icinga2
